title: Digital Puppet Masters Tournament Series - 1v1 (Tonight 6pm AEST)

embed.description: This organization will run tournaments for teams and players of all ranks and skill level, with a main focus on League Of Legends in the Oceanic Region.

body:
Just a reminder about this weeks 1v1 tournament.
Friday 29th September at 6pm AEST. (tonight)
Please check-in to the Battlefy client and the discord channel between :-
5.30-6pm. (Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane)
7.30-8pm. (New Zealand)
5-5.30pm. (South Australia)
3.30-4pm. (Western Australia)

This tournament is a single elimination 1v1 event. It will be first to take to Nexus on the Howling Abyss Map (Blind Pick).

This week the prizes are:-
1st $10 Riot Gift Card.

Riot have also provided:-
1st 1000rp

All Participants receive a 4-win IP Boost

Entry is free and you can register here anytime :- 
https://battlefy.com/digital-puppet-masters
(please not this weeks tournament is R18)

If you have any question feel free to drop me a line on my discord channel 
or post in the allocated area:-
https://discord.gg/4fYdqnU

Alternatively email :-
digitalpuppetmasters@gmail.com

Note: the tournament is run through the Battlefy Client and the Discord Channel, so please be sure to check-in to both applications at the time of the tournament.

Don't be late, as this tournament starts on schedule. The draw is done at 6pm AEST from checked-in players only.
